version.text: About category choice, a configuration to the members of the roles chosen categories are limited.\n\n There should be no restriction, so both fields (role selection and category selection) are to be left blank.
The bearing is here will appear in the display selection menu "Configuration selection ...".\n\nA configuration can be deleted by the contents of the field name is deleted.
Date of test is the date field used for the calculations (Either a profile field of type "Date" or choosing a role, the beginning of role membership)

The specified text is appended to the age or anniversary. "th birthday on the #Day#.#Month#" could, for example, are displayed as "30th birthday on the 10.02.".

Placeholder:
#Day# = Day
#Month# = Month
#Year# = Year
About values can be filtered to specific values. 30,40,50 means eg that only 30th, 40th or 50th birthdays or anniversaries are displayed. Should not be filtered, the field should be left blank.

Example:
Name: Round birthday
Date of test: Birthday
Values: 30,40,50,60,70,80 (No filtering is desired, then the field should be left blank)
Additional text: th birthday on the #Month#.#Day#.

Here any number of configurations can be created for the birthday and anniversary list. In the display of the birthday list one of these configurations is selected using "Configuration selection..." as the basis for the presentation.
Select the columns to be displayed in the list.
Delete only data of the current organization.
- When you delete the data, an error has occurred..\n
- The created data has been cleared.\n
\nTo completely remove the plugin now the browser must be closed and the program files and the link in the menu must be removed. The "Next" button initializes the plugin again with default values.
- The table "adm_plugin_preferences" could not be deleted because it houses more data from other plugins.\n
- When you delete the e-mail texts an error has occurred.\n
- The e-mail texts created by the plugin have been deleted.\n
About the uninstall generated by the plugin entries can be deleted from the database.
Choose from the scope of the installation.\n\n***ATTENTION: This routine deletes only the entries in the Admidio database. Program files and the link in the menu will not be deleted! ***
Allows the documentation of the plugin can be opened (An existing Internet connection is required because the data is located on admidio.org).
ERROR: At least one configuration to be present!

Here, the text can be customized and added to an e-mail. Texts have two paragraphs (subject & content) which are identified by titles like #subject# and #content#. Content parts follow after this titles. Each message can have free space for current messages.

IMPORTANT: To send an e-mail, the the profile field Email has to be displayed in a column.

Placeholder:
%user_first_name% = First name of the member
%user_last_name% = Last name of the member
%organization_long_name% = Name of the organization
%config% = Text of the last column (configurations-column)

#subject# Congratulations
#content# Dear Member,

on your %config% we will send you best wishes.

With best regards
%organization_long_name%
The values for the preview list (Multiple entries must be separated by commas; e.g.: -10,-1,0,1,2,10,20,30,365,1000)
About roll select a configuration may be restricted to members of the selected roles.\n\n There should be no restriction, so both fields (role selection and category selection) are to be left blank.
Choose from the rollers, whose members may call the plugin.
Choose from the rollers, whose members may access the settings of the plugin.
By default, the current date is used. If the database is supposed to start January 1st of the current year, the checkbox has to be selected.
